meanings.definition: The quality or state of being accidental.
meanings.sent1: Her constant tripping over things showed her accidentalnesses.
meanings.sent2: The accidentalnesses of the situation made it all the more surprising.
meanings.sent3: The accidentalnesses of the spilled milk led to a slippery situation.
meanings.sent4: In the chaos of the party, the accidentalnesses of the broken vase went unnoticed.
meanings.sent5: The accidentalnesses of his actions left a trail of confusion behind.

meanings.definition: The occurrence of events by chance.
meanings.sent1: The accidentalnesses of their meeting at the park was like fate.
meanings.sent2: Life is full of unexpected accidentalnesses that shape our journey.
meanings.sent3: The accidentalnesses of winning the lottery felt like a dream.
meanings.sent4: The accidentalnesses of the storm hitting during the picnic was unfortunate.
meanings.sent5: The accidentalnesses of the car breaking down delayed their trip.
